pr_title: Updates logger from using Log4j 1.x to 2.x

timeline.message: Rename properties file to match log4j2 specs.
Update properties to matching Log4j2 ones.
Update to use Log4j2 through SLF4J api.
Resetting context after each test run.
Move netty configuration back into properties file.
Add tests for expected log configuration.
Comment out FileAppender because it is not used.
